metadata.description:
my genesis drop on Sound (!!!) and the second song in a series of 10 🌸

“leamme lone (붊)” is a track decades in the making, produced by bankx. we’ve been friends since 2002, always dabbled in music together, but never put out an official release — until now. bankx used to say he wanted me to spit in Korean on one of his beats, so i knew i had to kick off the song the way it is now.

the song itself is a reflective sketch of fading memories, wanting to be alone but not lonely, and all the contradictory emotions of growing up.

lyrics.text:
i’m just trying to bloom like 미나리
인생 걸어 달린 이 십만리
hitmonlee couldn't get like me
우린 해가 뜨면 물어봐 비왔니
추억은 많아 도 팔지는 말자
또 
한잔 곧 두잔 whoa
또 한잔 곧 두잔 no 
no limits on these tanks like mmm	   
대충 달려도 난 금
찾아 봐야 찾을수 없는 흠
ok you gon catch up hmm 니 첫걸음 근데 언제 쯤
it’s bloomynextdoor
hatin outside what you doin that for
i’m right back like i hit back/forward
back back and i didn’t ask for it 
i didn’t ask for it

just leamme lone just leamme lone
just leamme lone 
just leamme lone
bish leamme lone just leamme lone
bish leamme lone just leamme lone

i don’t always win but I never lose
just want my 순두부 from better views
from my day ones to my one days
i been tryna take off but there’s issues on the runway
heard you got married thru the grapevine
hope u doing alright and the baby’s weight fine
and life unfolding like the dreams we used to whisper over red wine on our late nights
all those all those late nights  	
greatness takes time 
i know
i been rapping just like this since i was 14
remember jaws all wired shut sippin morphine
it's only bad news when the phone ring
when the phone ring
the phone ring
when the phone ring
pls don't ring	
don’t ring
no more
no

just leamme lone just leamme lone
just leamme lone 
just leamme lone
just leamme lone 
just leamme lone pls leamme lone
just leamme lone
